remarks: An atom under a co-atom is strictly less than it.  TODO: is this needed?  (Contributed by NM, 1-Jun-2012.)
statement:
lhplt.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhplt.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
lhplt.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
lhplt.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhplt $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( P e. A /\ P .<_ W ) ) -> P .< W ) $.
